Set.Text: A fast Ranged Unit on flat ground, but slowed when entering rough terrain. Only the Egyptians may build it. This Unit does not require [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses to be built, unlike the Chariot Archer which it replaces. It also receives +25% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Combat Strenght during attack.
